actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the export of veneer quality walnut hardwood until Congress approves such exportation.

summary.text: Prohibits the export of veneer quality hardwood until Congress approves such exportation. Provides for a fine of not more than $1,000,000 for anyone who violates this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the export of veneer quality walnut hardwood until Congress approves such exportation.
